Let's use place value blocks to help us solve!

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/50fa0423bad14b1aba402370474310fe9a62eb56)

$300=\purpleD{3}\text{ hundreds} + \blueE{0}\text{ tens} + \maroonD{0}\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one hundred into tens, we will see that $1\text{ hundred}= 10\text{ tens}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8c372c3bcf29ff756e7c045ec7186ec8af75d650)

So, $\purpleD3\text{ hundreds} = \blueE{30}\text{ tens}$

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/9817d99fd2524e68b4cdfbcf9b4144e1f8c51647)

If we break apart one ten into ones, we will see that $1\text{ ten}= 10\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e4fdf448967cc3f80b9adac27e4758efcc081e2c)

So, $\blueE{30}\text{ tens} = \maroonD{300}\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/ab1a0f6e017ccd70af900f93b2922d1953ca40d4)
